name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Integration Engineer with 9+ years of experience in designing and implementing healthcare interoperability solutions utilizing **FHIR**, **HL7**, and **SMART on FHIR**. Exceptional problem-solving skills and ability to lead cross-functional teams to drive project success, streamline development processes, and optimize performance in dynamic environments.
